game.title: In Search of the Lost Relic
game.objective: Recover the lost relic from the ancient ruins.
game.description: The ancient relic is said to hold great power, and many have sought to find it. You have been hired by a wealthy collector to locate the relic and bring it to him.
game.reward: A large sum of money and a rare artifact.

task.description: The ruins are located in a remote and dangerous part of the world. You will need to be careful and well-prepared.
task.location: The ancient ruins are located in the Valley of the Dead.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the underground chamber where the relic is hidden.
task.description: The entrance to the chamber is well-hidden. You will need to use your wits and your skills to find it.
task.location: The entrance to the chamber is located in the center of the ruins.

task.objective: Retrieve the relic from the chamber.
task.description: The relic is guarded by a powerful creature. You will need to defeat the creature in order to retrieve the relic.
task.location: The relic is located in the center of the chamber.

task.objective: Return to Sir Reginald with the relic.
task.description: Once you have retrieved the relic, you will need to return to Sir Reginald and deliver it to him.
task.location: Sir Reginald is located in his mansion in the city of Veridian.
